description: Safely destroy an OpenClaw instance and clean up resources
steps: Confirm destruction with user: 'Are you sure you want to destroy {name}? This cannot be undone.'
Remove from Tailscale: `ssh root@{ip} 'tailscale logout'` (if accessible)
Delete SSH key from Hetzner: `hcloud ssh-key delete {name}-key`
Archive instance metadata: move instances/{name}/ to instances/.archive/{name}-{timestamp}/
Update archive metadata: add destroyed_at timestamp
Report completion: 'Instance {name} destroyed. Resources cleaned up.'
